short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Time is money, and money is time. Using this extension to visualize prices as time..

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This chrome extension will replace prices on e-commerce websites (Amazon, for now) with the originally displayed price with a calculation based on the user's provided hourly rate or salary information how many hours of work would it take to afford this item (for example if you make 25 dollars an hour and you are on a page for a product that costs $50,  it will display :  $50, 2 hours of work)
